summary: This document is an email chain from April 9, 2021, regarding a media inquiry from reporter Grant Hodgson of London's 'The Sunday Mirror' newspaper. The inquiry asks the FBI to comment on its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, specifically regarding a photograph of Prince Andrew with Maxwell and an alleged victim, and the FBI's liaison with law firms representing Prince Andrew. The FBI's press office declines to confirm or deny the existence of investigations.

events.title: Media Inquiry to FBI
events.description: Reporter Grant Hodgson sends an email to the FBI press office seeking comment on the Epstein/Maxwell investigation, specifically regarding a photograph of Prince Andrew and liaison with his legal teams.

keyFacts: In April 2021, a reporter inquired if the FBI was liaising with law firms representing Prince Andrew (Matrix Law and Blackfords) regarding its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

The inquiry specifically referenced a photograph of Prince Andrew with Ghislaine Maxwell and an alleged victim, reportedly taken by Jeffrey Epstein at Maxwell's London home, which the Prince had previously denied meeting.
The FBI's press office, following policy, declined to confirm or deny the existence of any investigations in response to the media inquiry.
The email chain indicates coordination between FBI press offices in New York and Los Angeles regarding the handling of this external media request.
